about_us.title: About us
about_us.subtitle: Technology brings a better tomorrow.
about_us.description: We are a team of engineers, designers, hackers, activists, and information security experts dedicated to building human-centered, responsible, sustainable, and equitable technologies for a more prosperous tomorrow.
about_us.description_founded: We do this by placing the best human qualities of kindness, compassion, tolerance, empathy and cooperation at the core of everything we do.
about_us.description_funded: We successfully crowdfunded Okuna in September 2018 and are currently in alpha testing with over 3,500 members.
about_us.our_backers: ...and the 3,000+ backers who make this project possible!
about_us.ambassadors_desc: People help us spread the word and support everything we do.
